reviews.review_msg: Greg is the "cool" prof, like the kind depicted in film or television: zeitgeist-y and slightly subversive. His greatest teaching strength is his willingness to help his students beyond what is "required." He will make time and be understanding. That said, his instructing would improve with a more focused, directed objective achieved each class.

An amazing prof who takes genuine care in teaching and broadening the intellectual horizons of his students. A great guy to go to for help or just to shoot the breeze. Extremely approachable and friendly.
